MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Rhewl and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.02PM. Our emergency response team is currently onsite carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.00PM on 17th December 2020.
